trustfund:
TF025676-PHRD - SECOND CONTRACTUAL
            SAVINGS DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM LOAN PROJ,TF025319-PHRD-SECOND CONTRACTUAL SAVINGS
            DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM,TF029597-PHRD-SECOND CONTRACTUAL SAVINGS DEV.

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second Contractual
            Development Program (CSDP II) Adjustment Loan Project is to
            support the second phase of the Government's
            Contractual Savings Development Program, which is designed
            to: (a) increase the equity, efficiency, and sustainability
            of the old age security system and gradually lead to greater
            effective coverage; (b) implement a financially viable
            pension system; (c) limit the fiscal impact of the current
            pension system; (d) raise the level of institutional savings
            and improve the allocative efficiency of domestic savings;
            and (e) enhance capital market development by stimulating
            greater private financial intermediation. The components
            include: (a) implementing, consolidating, and fine-tuning
            the reformed system for private sector workers; (b) updating
            estimates of the fiscal costs of transition; (c) deepening
            reforms to Instituto del Fondo Nacional de la Vivienda de
            los Trabajadores (INFONAVIT) (National Workers Housing Fund
            Institute); (d) advancing in the technical preparatory work
            for the reform of the public pension systems; (e) sustaining
            public confidence through education and information; and (f)
            advancing in the implementation of complementary financial
            market initiatives.
